title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A beloved soul reminds you that money cant buy the most precious facets of life. Perhaps youre really seeking connection as you shop for sales and special discounts. But reaching out to a friend, family member, or partner likely wont cost you a thing except vulnerability. But first you may need to reckon with your pride or fear of rejection. Maybe the opposition between the stubborn Taurus Moon and Venus in wary Scorpio mirrors how torn you are about your dilemma. Yet, if youre willing to risk exposure, you might discover what vast treasure waits for you once you open your heart. Nothing ventured, nothing gained. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
